name: Raid On Coasts
description: Raid On Coasts is a real time strategy game set in a massive Middle East themed land mass to cause chaos and carnage on !
minimum_requirements: OS: windows xp Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: intel HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.4 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: intel HD graphics 5500 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 256 MB available space
